subject: AI Prompt Engineering
title: Introduction to Prompt Engineering
content:
AI Prompt Engineering is the art and science of crafting effective instructions for AI models.
        
        Key principles:
        - Be specific and clear in your instructions
        - Provide context when necessary
        - Use examples to guide the AI's output
        - Test and iterate on your prompts
        
        A good prompt structure includes:
        1. Context: Background information
        2. Instruction: What you want the AI to do
        3. Example: Sample of desired output
        
        This helps the AI understand exactly what you need and produce better results.
